eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.calc

Class DamageCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.wauz.wauzcore.players.calc.DamageCalculator

  • public class DamageCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Used to recalculate how much damage or heal players deal and receive. Also handles stuff like damage boni, reflection, leech and PvP-potions.
    Author:
    Wauzmons

      • reflect

        public static void reflect(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDamageByEntityEvent event)
        Determines the amount of damage a player reflects. If the player is blocking, the attacker and themselve are thrown back slightly.
        Parameters:
        event - The damage event.
        See Also:
        EquipmentUtils.getReflectionDamage(ItemStack), SkillUtils.callPlayerFixedDamageEvent(Player, Entity, double)

      • heal

        public static void heal(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityRegainHealthEvent event)
        Determines the amount of healing a player receives. Spawns a heal indicator afterwards.
        Parameters:
        event - The heal event.
        See Also:
        ValueIndicator.spawnHealIndicator(org.bukkit.Location, int)

      • kill

        public static void kill(org.bukkit.event.entity.EntityDeathEvent event)
        Handles health or mana leech, when a player kills an entity.
        Parameters:
        event - The death event.
        See Also:
        EquipmentUtils.getEnhancementOnKillHP(ItemStack), EquipmentUtils.getEnhancementOnKillMP(ItemStack)

      • setHealth

        public static void setHealth(org.bukkit.entity.Player player,
                             int hp)
        Sets the new health of a player. Handles value overflows and health restore after death. Updates the action bar afterwards.
        Parameters:
        player - The player that gets their health set.
        hp - The new amount of health.

      • hasPvPProtection

        public static boolean hasPvPProtection(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
        Checks if a player has a pvp protection effect.
        Parameters:
        player - The player to check.
        Returns:
        If the player has a pvp protection effect.

      • applyPvPProtection

        public static void applyPvPProtection(org.bukkit.event.player.PlayerInteractEvent event)
        Applies pvp protection for a player, based on a potion interaction. This status effect increase shares the cooldown for food effects.
        Parameters:
        event - The interact event.
        See Also:
        Cooldown.playerFoodConsume(Player), FoodUtils.getPvPProtection(ItemStack)
